You're ditching your work?\""},{"lineNumber":32964,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こっちの仕事の方がたぶん効果的だわ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This job is probably more effective.\""},{"lineNumber":32965,"originalJapaneseLine":"　総統と一緒に、魔軍の撃退ってね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"With the Supreme Commander, repelling the demon army.\""},{"lineNumber":32966,"originalJapaneseLine":"　国民への宣伝材料になるわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It'll be good PR for the people.\""},{"lineNumber":32967,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふーん、まあよかろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmmm, well then, fine.\""},{"lineNumber":32968,"originalJapaneseLine":"　では派手にいくぞ。がははははは！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Let's make it flashy then. Here I comeoooo!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やかましい。できる俺様はそっちもバッチリだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Shut up. I, who can do it, have got that covered perfectly too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 近くを寄ったついでに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Since I'm passing nearby,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 軽く運動してやろうというだけの話だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's just a matter of doing some light exercise."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でしたら……はい。ありがとうございます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If that's the case... yes. Thank you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戻ってきたらたっぷりもてなせよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When you come back, I'll treat you lavishly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がはははは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahaha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔軍相手にそこまで言うのはお前くらいだぜ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You're about the only one who talks that way to the demon army,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まったく……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Really..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん……よし。国土の回復は順調ね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah... good. The country's recovery is going well."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 国内の被害は長い目で見て復興しないと……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But the domestic damage will take a long time to rebuild..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お疲れ様です、陛下」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thank you for your hard work, Your Majesty."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あー、そうね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, yes."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ようやく、少し楽になってきたかな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Finally, things have become a little easier."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もっとも…………
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ダム再建工事の計画書はこれ！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is this the plan for the dam reconstruction work!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: んー、石材の質、ちょっと再確認して！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, check the quality of the stone materials again!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 想定の数字が曖昧すぎるわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The estimated figures are way too vague."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「医療費の国家臨時負担の計画案は！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What about the plan for the state's temporary burden of medical expenses!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: …………ん、基本はこれで良し。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Hmm, basically this is fine."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 順次、重傷者から優先する旨、足しといて！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Add that the priority goes to the severely injured in order!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「税制改革案と臨時登用…………って、何これ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The tax reform plan and temporary appointments... what is this?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 提出者の身辺、ちょっと洗っといて。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Investigate the background of the submitter a little."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 旧貴族派の人間とか居そうだわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Seems like there might be people from the old aristocratic faction."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アニスがまたどっか行ったーーー！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Anice has gone somewhere again!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後で私が行くから、何とか居場所だけ特定して！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'll go later, so just somehow pinpoint her location!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……戦況がやばい時より
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I feel like it's busier now than when the battle situation was bad,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 忙しくなってる気がするわ、千鶴子……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Chizuko..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「内政関連は情報魔法が不可欠ですからね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Information magic is indispensable for internal affairs..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こっちに回せるものは回して貰ってるんだけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We're getting whatever we can shifted this way, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チョチョマンさんもフル回転中だし……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even Chocho-man is working at full capacity..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こっちは忙しいんですが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm busy here, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こういう状態だと、市民に不満が出るかもですね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In this kind of situation, citizens might get dissatisfied."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうしても、手が回りきらなくて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No matter what, we just can't keep up..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「クレーム対応で何かの策を打つと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When we take measures to deal with complaints,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 余計に諸々遅れちゃうんだけどなぁ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "everything ends up delayed even more..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーん、なんか大変だな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmmm, sounds tough."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひゃっ……きゃあぁぁっ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hyah... Kyaaah!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何っ……て、ランス！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What... Lance!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いきなりどこ触ってんのよっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Where are you suddenly touching!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちょっと尻を撫でたくらいだろうが。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I just patted your butt a little."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははははは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahahaha."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………何しに来たのよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...What did you come here for?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、見ての通り忙しいんだけど」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As you can see, I'm busy right now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「余裕のない奴め。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You poor thing without any leeway."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せっかく魔軍を蹴散らしに来てやったのに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I came all this way to chase away the demon army for you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔軍を？　でももう、ゼスにはランスがいないと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The demon army? But now, in Zeth, there's no one who can defeat them without Lance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 倒せないようなのはいないわよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Not even the demons or the great generals..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人も大将軍も……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Not the demons or the great generals..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「逃げ遅れたヤツとかいるだろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There are probably some who were left behind."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気分転換に経験値稼ぎだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'll earn some experience while refreshing myself."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは……うん、助かる、けど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well... yeah, that helps, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あ。待てよ……そっか。私も行くわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah. Wait... I see. I'm going too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あん？　お前、仕事放り出してか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? You're ditching your work?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こっちの仕事の方がたぶん効果的だわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This job is probably more effective."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統と一緒に、魔軍の撃退ってね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "With the Supreme Commander, repelling the demon army."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 国民への宣伝材料になるわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It'll be good PR for the people."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーん、まあよかろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmmm, well then, fine."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: では派手にいくぞ。がははははは！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Let's make it flashy then. Gahahahaha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市連合臨時本部、Mランド――――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Free City Alliance Temporary Headquarters, M-Land———

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははははは！　俺様参じょーーーーう！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahaha! Here I comeoooo!"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やかましい。できる俺様はそっちもバッチリだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Shut up. I, who can do it, have got that covered perfectly too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 近くを寄ったついでに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Since I'm passing nearby,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 軽く運動してやろうというだけの話だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's just a matter of doing some light exercise."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でしたら……はい。ありがとうございます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If that's the case... yes. Thank you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戻ってきたらたっぷりもてなせよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When you come back, I'll treat you lavishly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がはははは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahaha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔軍相手にそこまで言うのはお前くらいだぜ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You're about the only one who talks that way to the demon army,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まったく……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Really..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん……よし。国土の回復は順調ね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah... good. The country's recovery is going well."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 国内の被害は長い目で見て復興しないと……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But the domestic damage will take a long time to rebuild..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お疲れ様です、陛下」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thank you for your hard work, Your Majesty."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あー、そうね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, yes."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ようやく、少し楽になってきたかな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Finally, things have become a little easier."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もっとも…………
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ダム再建工事の計画書はこれ！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is this the plan for the dam reconstruction work!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: んー、石材の質、ちょっと再確認して！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, check the quality of the stone materials again!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 想定の数字が曖昧すぎるわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The estimated figures are way too vague."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「医療費の国家臨時負担の計画案は！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What about the plan for the state's temporary burden of medical expenses!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: …………ん、基本はこれで良し。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Hmm, basically this is fine."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 順次、重傷者から優先する旨、足しといて！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Add that the priority goes to the severely injured in order!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「税制改革案と臨時登用…………って、何これ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The tax reform plan and temporary appointments... what is this?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 提出者の身辺、ちょっと洗っといて。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Investigate the background of the submitter a little."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 旧貴族派の人間とか居そうだわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Seems like there might be people from the old aristocratic faction."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アニスがまたどっか行ったーーー！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Anice has gone somewhere again!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後で私が行くから、何とか居場所だけ特定して！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'll go later, so just somehow pinpoint her location!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……戦況がやばい時より
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I feel like it's busier now than when the battle situation was bad,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 忙しくなってる気がするわ、千鶴子……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Chizuko..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「内政関連は情報魔法が不可欠ですからね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Information magic is indispensable for internal affairs..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こっちに回せるものは回して貰ってるんだけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We're getting whatever we can shifted this way, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チョチョマンさんもフル回転中だし……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even Chocho-man is working at full capacity..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こっちは忙しいんですが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm busy here, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こういう状態だと、市民に不満が出るかもですね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In this kind of situation, citizens might get dissatisfied."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうしても、手が回りきらなくて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No matter what, we just can't keep up..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「クレーム対応で何かの策を打つと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When we take measures to deal with complaints,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 余計に諸々遅れちゃうんだけどなぁ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "everything ends up delayed even more..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーん、なんか大変だな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmmm, sounds tough."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひゃっ……きゃあぁぁっ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hyah... Kyaaah!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何っ……て、ランス！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What... Lance!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いきなりどこ触ってんのよっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Where are you suddenly touching!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちょっと尻を撫でたくらいだろうが。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I just patted your butt a little."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははははは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahahaha."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………何しに来たのよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...What did you come here for?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、見ての通り忙しいんだけど」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As you can see, I'm busy right now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「余裕のない奴め。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You poor thing without any leeway."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せっかく魔軍を蹴散らしに来てやったのに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I came all this way to chase away the demon army for you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔軍を？　でももう、ゼスにはランスがいないと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The demon army? But now, in Zeth, there's no one who can defeat them without Lance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 倒せないようなのはいないわよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Not even the demons or the great generals..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人も大将軍も……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Not the demons or the great generals..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「逃げ遅れたヤツとかいるだろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There are probably some who were left behind."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気分転換に経験値稼ぎだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'll earn some experience while refreshing myself."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは……うん、助かる、けど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well... yeah, that helps, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あ。待てよ……そっか。私も行くわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah. Wait... I see. I'm going too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あん？　お前、仕事放り出してか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? You're ditching your work?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こっちの仕事の方がたぶん効果的だわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This job is probably more effective."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統と一緒に、魔軍の撃退ってね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "With the Supreme Commander, repelling the demon army."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 国民への宣伝材料になるわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It'll be good PR for the people."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーん、まあよかろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmmm, well then, fine."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: では派手にいくぞ。がははははは！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Let's make it flashy then. Gahahahaha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市連合臨時本部、Mランド――――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Free City Alliance Temporary Headquarters, M-Land———

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははははは！　俺様参じょーーーーう！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahaha! Here I comeoooo!"
